text.div: ValueSet that rappresent the set of ClassCode(s) for a Non-patient file as defined in IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement - Non-Patient File Sharing profile (NPFSm). The actual list of codes is intended to be extensible. This conformance resource is Informative. The Normative content can be found through Non-patient File Sharing (NPFSm) Rev. 3.0

title.value: IHE ValueSet of Class Codes for use with Non-Patient File Sharing

description.value: ValueSet that rappresent the set of ClassCode(s) for a Non-patient file as defined in IHE IT Infrastructure Technical Framework Supplement - Non-Patient File Sharing profile (NPFSm). The actual list of codes is intended to be extensible. This conformance resource is Informative. The Normative content can be found through http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php/Non-patient_File_Sharing_(NPFSm).
